name: Pixelscape Islands (Demo)
description:
For those of you that are stuck inside, take a trip to Pixelscape Islands and craft your own outdoor getaway in a serene setting.

**This is a prototype of a very small slice of the final game, and is being released especially early in its development. Expect bugs, missing features, and unfinished art and sound. There is no tutorial, currently, but 4 example islands are included to load.**

Several updates are planned for the prototype, but development will eventually transition to completing the full game experience, where you will discover and unlock new objects and creatures to place in your islands and interact with.

______________________________________________________________________________________

Note:  The animals in this prototype are not the creatures players will discover and unlock in the full game.  There is currently nothing to unlock.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Upcoming Features:

  • Unlocked camera and more build space
  • Animated, text-free tooltips
  • Rebindable keys
  • Undo/redo
  • Animated grid overlay
  • Full weather control system
  • Improved Night Time
  • More plants,  and new critters with improved behavior!
